TopicTitle: Will there ever be a patch to make BDA work with DMP?

Articles.Content:
I cant think of another game where you can build your own aircraft or even spacecraft with great physics accuracy and have the potential to fight them. Sadly there hasn't been a mod that allowed compatibility between Dark Multi Player and BDA since 1.05. Here is the link to that mod if you don't know what I mean: 

Wouldn't it be great to have somewhat proper dogfights with aircraft you built in KSP? I'm not a programmer or know much about servers, but it seems to me that the people capable of making a mod like this for 1.3 just don't know that this is a possibility. 

Is somebody working on this or something similar? Does anybody plan working on this? Can or will it be a thing?

2 hours ago, Not Sure said:

I cant think of another game where you can build your own aircraft or even spacecraft with great physics accuracy and have the potential to fight them. Sadly there hasn't been a mod that allowed compatibility between Dark Multi Player and BDA since 1.05. Here is the link to that mod if you don't know what I mean: 

Wouldn't it be great to have somewhat proper dogfights with aircraft you built in KSP? I'm not a programmer or know much about servers, but it seems to me that the people capable of making a mod like this for 1.3 just don't know that this is a possibility. 

Is somebody working on this or something similar? Does anybody plan working on this? Can or will it be a thing?

 

Sounds like an opportunity to get into modding.

Just now, goldenpsp said:

Sounds like an opportunity to get into modding.

Ughhhhhhh Ikr? I'm taking an intro to programming class but it's only visual basic. How hard can it be?

Just now, Not Sure said:

Ughhhhhhh Ikr? I'm taking an intro to programming class but it's only visual basic. How hard can it be?

Who knows.  But that's how modders are born.  There is something they want in game that doesn't exist.  You have a head start as there is a mod, it just needs to be updated.  There are a number of modders here who started with no programming experience.

Just now, goldenpsp said:

Who knows.  But that's how modders are born.  There is something they want in game that doesn't exist.  You have a head start as there is a mod, it just needs to be updated.  There are a number of modders here who started with no programming experience.

True, i'll look at how the last version worked and try working from there. I'll give it a shot.
